seo.title: Deepening Practice – 8 sessions for leaders & practitioners | SustainSage
seo.description: An eight-session coaching space for leaders and practitioners who want a rigorous, human thinking partner.

hero.title: Deepening Practice – 8 sessions
hero.subtitle: Long-term space to refine how you think, decide, relate and lead.

fit.title: For who
items: People leading teams, projects or communities who already reflect, but want a more rigorous thinking partner.
Coaches / helpers who want a space where they can be human, not “the professional”.

focus.title: What we focus on
items: How you use power, voice, and boundaries.
How to stay human without over-giving.

ethics.title: ICF & ethics
items: Regular check-ins on whether this still serves you.
Explicit encouragement to seek supervision/therapy where needed; we don’t try to be everything.

body.value: Use the 20-minute chat to check fit. If a different container or supervision is more appropriate, we will say so plainly.
